text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
If I want to compete in the Derby, I<n>have to push my body
further than<n>ever!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'll work even harder!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
For the dream I share with Maruzen...<n>and starting from
today, for you too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Chiyono O needs no reminder<n>to work hard. So if
there's anything I<n>can do as her trainer, it would be...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you going somewhere too?
choice_data_list: Thought I'd check out the bookstore.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: The bookstore! Wait, are you afterThe Complete Book of WinningProverbs that just went on saletoday too?!
choice_data_list: Er, I had another book in mind, actually.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, n-never mind then. For a second<n>there I thought you
were one of us...<n>Ahaha...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but we're still going to the same<n>place. If you don't
mind, how about<n>we go together?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't have any reason to say no, so<n>we head to the
bookstore together.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Yay! Got what I came for!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
The hottest new publication in the<n>proverb world... I don't
know what I<n>would've done if it was sold out.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Wait, Trainer? Don't tell me you're<n>going to buy that entire
mountain of<n>books!
choice_data_list:
I-I'll have them split it into two bags, so we're
good!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Your arms are shaking! I'll<n>help carry some!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: There we go... I didn't know you<n>were such an avid reader.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Umamusume Growth Theory,and Post-Debut Training Techniques? Wait, are these all...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: They're for me, aren't they?! You<n>really didn't have to...
choice_data_list: There's not much I can really do to help you.
There's not much I can really do to help you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: So I might as well go all out where I can.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ohh... Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Maybe you and I do have something<n>in common after all.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
All I could ever do was play it safe,<n>sticking it out and
staying dedicated to<n>practice, practice, and more practice...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
If I just kept fighting, maybe I could<n>move at least a few
steps forward...<n>That was what kept me going.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
The shoes I was trying to fill were so<n>big, there were times
when I almost<n>lost my footing, but...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad I kept working at it! Because<n>otherwise, I never
would've met such<n>an amazing trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In my room that night, as I'm digging<n>into the books I
purchased...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: To my hard-working trainer...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Today was fun! I feel like I was able<n>to learn a little more
about you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and those training books! I bet<n>you're reading them right
now, aren't<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It made me really happy to hear how<n>you felt! But don't feel
like you have<n>to do so much, okay?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Lastly, a little proverb to cheer you on.<n>"Walk as two, leave
footprints of<n>four!"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
So let's keep on forging ahead as<n>two! Okay, I'll see you at
training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The proverb doesn't quite compute,<n>but it's the thought that
counts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I start typing out a short thank you,<n>then change my mind
and reach for<n>the call button.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: H-hello? Chiyono O here! Did<n>something urgent come up?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is this about the message I just<n>sent? D-did I say
something weird?
choice_data_list: No, I just wanted to say thanks.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Thanks?
choice_data_list: You really got me motivated. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, no, I'm just glad I could be<n>helpful!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I think that was one of my best<n>proverbs yet! Feel free to
use it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The proper usage of her proverb still<n>eludes me, but for
now, I'll just enjoy<n>this chat with Chiyono O.
